verbs.description: [ARG0: Hurricane Maria] [V: killed] [ARG1: 64 Americans] [ARGM-LOC: in Puerto Rico] . The belated , inadequate , incompetent , indifferent , and corrupt response of the Trump Administration killed more than 4,000 more .

Hurricane Maria killed 64 Americans in Puerto Rico . [ARG0: The belated , inadequate , incompetent , indifferent , and corrupt response of the Trump Administration] [V: killed] [ARG1: more than 4,000 more] .
